casebody.data:
Michael VOGEL, Employee, Plaintiff,
v.
FOOD LION, LLC/Delhaize America, Inc., Employer, Self-Insured (Risk Management Services, Inc., Third-Party Administrator), Defendants. No. COA14-1301. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Nov. 3, 2015.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed in part; reversed and remanded in part.
